intro.heading: More than just shorter links
intro.text: Build your brand’s recognition and get detailed insights on how your links are performing.

features.heading: Advanced Statistics
features.text: Track how your links are performing across the web with our advanced statistics dashboard.

cards.heading: Brand Recognition
cards.text: Boost your brand recognition with each click. Generic links don’t mean a thing. Branded links help instil confidence in your content.

cards.heading: Detailed Records
cards.text: Gain insights into who is clicking your links. Knowing when and where people engage with your content helps inform better decisions.

cards.heading: Fully Customizable
cards.text: Improve brand awareness and content discoverability through customizable links, supercharging audience engagement.
